name: Harold: A Mind Control Adventure
description:
Dev NOTES!

1. the call to me button ((F)) doesnt work in the first level :/ ... this mechanic isnt needed on the first level.

2. the button on the 3rd level has a bug. 

Harold woke up to find his friends and himself had been abducted. He has to use his mind control powers to get his friends who are too afraid to do anything out of danger. Use strength in numbers to make paths and solve puzzles. Save as many as you can!
